Potion, rare
This elixir looks, smells, and tastes like a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.wNKYbKYwOHbA7SH8]{potion of heroism}; however, it is actually a poisonous elixir masked by illusion magic. An @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.5aNJ7nXRraSfUL6a]{identify} spell reveals its true nature.
If you drink it, you must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be corrupted by the diabolical power within the elixir for 1 week. While corrupted, you lose immunity to diseases, poison damage, and the poisoned condition. If you arenâ€™t normally immune to poison damage, you instead have vulnerability to poison damage while corrupted. The corruption can be removed with @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.ZTVg00JolCuPkOOX]{greater restoration} or similar magic.
